msbt.message: I was just jogging along the beach and saw Gulliver there. Looked like he'd fallen down!I woulda stopped to help him but, y'know, jogging!Anyway, you should go see how he's doing, .
You hear that K.K.'s gonna be playing a show over by Resident Services?Don't miss it! K.K. shreds on guitar, his abs are shredded, and he does it all without a shred of clothing!
I ran into Label a little while ago. She just kinda stared at my clothes.Hmmat least, I think she was staring at my clothes. She might've been staring at my rippling muscles!
I saw Saharah setting up a little while ago. Getting all the way out here has gotta be tough.Plus she's gotta haul all those rugs, . I bet her arms are BUFF!
K.K.'s playing a show over by Resident Services! He's even taking requests, !Bouncing from island to island, a guitar slung to your back, going to a new gym every day That's the life!
You see that Daisy Mae's here today?Her turnips are the best. I use 'em twice. First as dumbbells, then as a snack, !
Huh? Hey, . You ever feel like you're being watched?Hey, if someone wants to see what a thousand sit-ups looks like, I'll show 'em! They don't need to hide!
Have you gone to K.K.'s birthday show yet? He hardly ever does these, so you don't wanna miss it!Oh! And if you've never met K.K., fix that, . He is SUPER cool!
Word is K.K. Slider's doing a special birthday concert over by Resident Services later!K.K. is so cooland so ripped! What do you think his workout routine is like, ?I'd love to trade tips with him.
You see that Mabel's around? If you need something to wear, she'll get you covered, .I told her I wanted to show off my delts. She rolled her eyes a bunch, but she found me something!
Word is that C.J.'s here today! He's the hyper one. Really tough to miss, .The heavier the fish, the more he'll pay too. So you can get paid AND get a quick workout on the way!
Looks like Flick's visiting! You should go bug him if you haven't yet Bug him! Get it, ? Flick's usually kinda shy, but show him a great, big, muscular bug, and he gets SUPER excited!
You been to see Kicks yet? He's over by the plaza, .I was about to go over to look at sneakersbut then I remembered I always run barefoot anyway.

I spotted Celeste getting set up earlier. She offered to show me her telescope, but I was like, "why?"I mean telescopes are cool, but with all the eyeceps curls I've been doing, I just don't need one, !
I was doing some cross-training earlier and thought I saw someone new on the island, .But when I was done, they were gone! Think you could find 'em and help 'em out?
